main event: A civilian observed a reddish-white unidentified flying object at Wheelus AFB in Tripoli, Libya on 1 September 1958.
interesting points: The object changed size from that of a baseball to a football and then back to a baseball., The object moved in a zigzag manner and appeared slow but also seemed to hover at times., There was a significant temperature inversion noted at the time of the observation., Multiple reports suggested the object maneuvered in various patterns including sudden stops and starts., The sighting occurred on a moonlit night with light cloud cover.
witness description: civilian, tech representative, 35 years old from New York, N.Y.
